dataIdInfo.idPurp: Feature Class contains the point geometries of the revised XY-locations of the Crossing Supercell storm tracks. These plots were generated using the "Plotting Lat/Lon" fields after any anomalies were flagged suspicious, and had their radar scans reviewed in GR2Analyst. The original tabular XY data has been maintained in the attributes as well. Data is maintained in WGS 84.
dataIdInfo.idCredit: Katie McKeown, Sarah Purpura, Roger Riggin IV
dataIdInfo.idAbs: Feature Class contains the point geometries of the revised XY-locations of the Crossing Supercell storm tracks. These plots were generated using the "Plotting Lat/Lon" fields after any anomalies were flagged suspicious, and had their radar scans reviewed in GR2Analyst. The original tabular XY data has been maintained in the attributes as well. Data is maintained in WGS 84.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.
